dialogue.zh:
Nice weather today, isn’t it?
Nice weather today, isn’t it?

Yeah, it feels 太好了.
Yeah, it feels いいですね.

dialogue.text: Did you do anything fun this morning?
dialogue.zh:
Did 你 anything fun this morning?
Did あなた do anything fun this morning?

Just a walk nearby.
Just a walk nearby.

dialogue.text: Sounds relaxing. What can I get for you?
dialogue.zh:
Sounds relaxing. What 可以 我 get 你?
Sounds relaxing. What できます 私 get for あなた?

A 小 cappuccino, 請.
A スモール cappuccino, お願いします.

熱 or 冰的?
ホット or アイス?

熱.
ホット.

任何 糖?
Any 砂糖?

不 糖.
いいえ 砂糖.

dialogue.text: Would you like cinnamon on top?
dialogue.zh:
Would 你 like cinnamon on top?
Would あなた like cinnamon on top?

是的, a little.
はい, a little.

here or to go?
For here or to go?

here.
For here.

dialogue.text: Do you want it extra foamy?
dialogue.zh:
你 想要 it extra foamy?
Do あなた want it extra foamy?

是的, extra foam.
はい, extra foam.

太好了. 請 take a seat.
いいですね. お願いします take a seat.

好的.
わかりました.

dialogue.text: We’re not too busy right now.
dialogue.zh:
We’re not too busy right now.
We’re not too busy right now.

That’s nice.
That’s nice.

dialogue.text: Your drink will be ready soon.
dialogue.zh:
Your drink will be ready soon.
Your drink will be ready soon.

謝謝.
ありがとう.

你 想要 水 too?
Do あなた want 水 too?

是的, 請.
はい, お願いします.

當然, it’s at the counter.
もちろん, it’s at the counter.

Got it.
Got it.

Here’s your cappuccino.
Here’s your cappuccino.

謝謝 你.
ありがとう あなた.

dialogue.text: Enjoy, and see you next time.
dialogue.zh:
Enjoy, and see 你 next time.
Enjoy, and see あなた next time.

See 你!
See あなた!
